about.header: Sport and Fun for young and old at a nOvy level

alt.1: Sports Hall

about.text: Is there a facility where everyone can be themselves and spend time the way they like? This was our idea when we designed Muszynova. To make everyone feel comfortable. With the youngest, teenagers and adults, families and singles, visitors and residents and organized groups in mind, our Recreation and Sports Park was created. We open the door to entertainment and activity at a new level of quality.

restaurant.header2: We’re setting a new standard and rediscovering the flavors of the Beskids – the novo way
restaurant.text: Looking for a unique place to enjoy a culinary experience in Muszyna or near Nowy Sącz? Muszynova Restaurant invites you to discover the flavors of the Beskids with a modern twist. It's the perfect spot for a family lunch, romantic dinner, special celebration, or business meeting. We offer a unique atmosphere, healthy and light dishes, and professional service.

alt.1: Modern-style vegetable salad served for dinner
alt.3: Ice cream in a wafer cone
alt.6: Coffee with whipped cream in a cup

item1.text: We promote the flavors of Beskid cuisine. We rediscover them anew, adding a modern twist.

item2.text: We think of the little ones, ensuring they enjoy their time with us. Happy kids are more eager to eat. Favorite fries? Why not sweet potato fries? We delight taste buds and teach healthy habits. To your health!

item3.text: Delicious food, healthier choices, and a cozy atmosphere. Pleasure rediscovered anew, not just in dining but also in enjoying a beautiful, loft-style interior.

item4.text: Pizza can be a healthier option with whole-grain flour. Don’t just eat—savor and nourish yourself with us.

item5.text: Great coffee, a touch of alcohol, a light salad, or a delightful piece of homemade dessert? The perfect spot to relax with a book or spend a pleasant evening with a loved one.

item6.text: A separate room for hosting celebrations with attractions for the youngest guests. Adults can chat at the table while kids… we promise food & fun for everyone.

aboutus.text: Muszynova – the name is a creative blend of the location 'Muszyna' and the word 'modern' in an international spelling, as we are open to everyone. It’s a promise, an invitation to rediscover the well-known resort in a 'new' way. In a fresh edition, with a new standard, for both young and old, we welcome local residents and tourists, individually or in groups. Active, delicious, uncompromising – that’s our new approach. A modern park and restaurant invite you to spend time in Muszyna differently, the way you like it. Rediscover the world of food and fun, surrounded by the beautiful nature of the Beskid Sądecki region.

alt.1: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park from the outside against a beautiful natural backdrop

cards.text: Muszyna is a well-known and beloved spa town that has been developing dynamically in recent years, attracting tourists from all over the world. This charming resort, nestled in the Beskid Sądecki region, captivates with its nature and numerous attractions, including sensory gardens, historic landmarks, mountain and cycling trails, as well as mineral water springs.

card1.text: In peace, with a view of green forests, right by the trail, with the distant sound of the Poprad River. That’s how you’ll spend your time with us – a new quality of interiors, paired with the beautiful surroundings of the Beskid region.

card2.text: A concise menu in a modern style with a Beskid touch. Light, nourishing, for kids and adults alike. Delicious coffee, drinks, and for kids, familiar favorites like pizza and desserts in a healthier version. With us, you can also host celebrations with attractions.

card3.text: Active leisure time in a new way, with fun. We encourage movement from an early age and are well-prepared for it. Four modernly equipped activity zones with facilities await professional athletes, juniors, families, and individual users.

cta.header: Welcome to the Muszynova Recreation and Sports Park!
cta.text: After exploring, we invite you to our Muszynova Recreation and Sports Park, which offers plenty of attractions for everyone! You'll find a sports hall with surfaces for playing football, volleyball, or basketball, a climbing wall, squash courts, a children's playroom with mazes and slides, a bike rental, a gym, and a fitness room. It's the perfect place to spend active time with family, friends, or on your own. Our restaurant serves light dishes with regional accents, and we've prepared special attractions for children. Visit us and discover entertainment at a new level!

1.header: What to see in Muszyna? 10 best attractions
1.text: Muszyna, a picturesque spa town in the Beskid Sądecki, located in the Poprad Valley, is an ideal place for relaxation for lovers of nature, history, and active leisure. Known for its healing mineral waters, rich history, and beautiful landscapes, it attracts tourists year-round. We’ve prepared a list of the 10 best attractions that will make you fall in love with this place. And at the end, we invite you to visit our Muszynova Recreational-Sports Park, where plenty of entertainment awaits!

list.1: 1. Sensory Gardens (Gardens of the Senses) - Muszyna’s biggest attraction, located on the slopes of Sucha Góra. Divided into zones – health, scents, sounds, taste, and touch – they offer therapeutic experiences for all senses. Strolling among fragrant herbs, murmuring streams, and colorful plants is a perfect way to relax. At the top, there’s a viewing tower with panoramic views of the Beskid Sądecki and, on clear days, the Tatra Mountains.
list.2: 2. Biblical Gardens - Located next to the Church of St. Joseph the Betrothed, the Biblical Gardens are a place for reflection and peace. Designed for meditation, they present scenes from the Bible in a creative way, e.g., a pond reminiscent of Moses’ story or a fig tree symbolizing paradise. Admission is free, and nearby is the ‘Maryja’ mineral water spring.
list.3: 3. Castle Ruins (Baszta Hill) - The ruins of a medieval castle on Baszta Hill are one of Muszyna’s oldest landmarks. Built in the 14th century, it served as a stronghold of the Muszyna State. Although only fragments of the walls remain, the site offers a beautiful view of the Poprad Valley. In May, May devotions are held here at the statue of the Virgin Mary.
list.4: 4. Regional Museum of the Muszyna State - Housed in a reconstructed 17th-century inn, the Regional Museum showcases Muszyna’s history, Lemko culture, and the Muszyna State’s past. You’ll find exhibits related to wine trade, craftsmanship, and local traditions. It’s a great place to explore the region’s rich history.
list.5: 5. Church of St. Joseph the Betrothed - A Baroque church from the turn of the 17th and 18th centuries, it’s an architectural gem of Muszyna. Inside, there’s a Gothic sculpture of the Virgin Mary with Child and a Renaissance tabernacle. Nearby, you can see a historic wall and a bell tower from 1803.
list.6: 6. Zapopradzie Spa Park - An ideal spot for families and those seeking relaxation. It features outdoor pools, an ice rink (in winter), a skatepark, and walking paths. This recreational hub is lively year-round.
list.7: 7. Mineral Water Tasting Rooms - Muszyna is famous for its mineral waters, such as ‘Muszynianka.’ Tasting rooms like ‘Milusia’ or ‘Cechini’ offer a chance to try waters with healing properties. It’s an essential part of visiting the spa, combining health with pleasure.
list.8: 8. Hiking and Cycling Trails - Muszyna is a paradise for active leisure enthusiasts. Hiking trails, e.g., to Jaworzyna Krynicka, and cycling routes in the Beskid Sądecki offer breathtaking views. Popular cycling routes can be found around Złockie.
list.9: 9. Poprad River Rafting - The Poprad River is perfect for mountain kayaking or rafting. Pontoon rafting trips of varying difficulty, from family-friendly to extreme, provide unforgettable thrills. A great attraction for adrenaline seekers.
list.10: 10. Malnik Hill Viewing Tower - Opened in 2023, the 40-meter viewing tower on Malnik Hill is Muszyna’s newest attraction. It offers spectacular views of the Beskid Sądecki and surrounding mountain ranges. It’s a perfect spot for a short hike and admiring the scenery.

alt.1: People on a mountain trail in Muszyna
alt.4: Map of tourist trails in Muszyna and Krynica

cta.text: Want to truly feel the atmosphere of Muszyna? After exploring the attractions, visit the Muszynova Recreation and Sports Park – here you'll find bikes, squash, a gym, kids' activities, and regional cuisine. All in one place!

2.header: The best hiking trails in Muszyna - discover the Beskid Sądecki
2.text: Muszyna, located in the heart of the Beskid Sądecki, is an ideal base for mountain hiking enthusiasts. Surrounded by picturesque Poprad valleys, forests, and peaks, it offers trails of varying difficulty – from leisurely family routes to challenging loops for experienced hikers. Below, we present the best trails around Muszyna to help you discover the region’s beauty. At the end, we invite you to the Muszynova Recreational-Sports Park, where active relaxation and regional flavors await after your hike!
2.header2: Why is Muszyna a paradise for tourists?
2.header3: The best hiking trails in Muszyna

list.1: 1. Malnik Hill Trail – a viewpoint for everyone Length: approx. 4.5 km (loop) Time: approx. 1.5 h Difficulty: Easy Description: Malnik Hill (726 m above sea level) is one of Muszyna’s best viewpoints, perfect for beginners and families. The yellow trail starts in central Muszyna, passes the old Jewish cemetery, and climbs to the summit, where a 40-meter viewing tower opened in 2023. The tower offers a panorama of the Beskid Sądecki, and on clear days, you can see the Tatras. The trail is short, well-marked, and features gentle ascents.
list.2: 2. Jaworzyna Krynicka Trail – a Beskid Sądecki classic Length: approx. 9 km (from Muszyna to Złockie, then to the summit) Time: approx. 3-4 h one way Difficulty: Medium/Challenging Description: The green trail from Muszyna through Złockie to Jaworzyna Krynicka (1114 m above sea level) is a must for mountain lovers. Along the way, you pass the ‘Cechini’ mineral water tasting room and the St. Demetrius Church in Złockie, part of the Wooden Architecture Trail. The trail winds through forests and meadows, and at the summit, you’ll find a PTTK shelter and views of the Tatras, Pieniny, and Beskid Niski. Less experienced hikers can shorten the route by using the gondola lift from Krynica-Zdrój.
list.3: 3. ‘Scrambled Egg Trail’ Loop – a walk with history Length: approx. 8 km (loop) Time: approx. 2.5-3 h Difficulty: Easy Description: This scenic trail from Muszyna to Złockie, called the ‘Scrambled Egg Trail,’ passes through Koziejówka (636 m above sea level) and the Złockie Tent Base. The trail starts at 21 Stycznia Street, passes the St. Anne spring, and climbs to the ridge. Along the way, you’ll see the Las Lipowy Obrożyska nature reserve and, in Złockie, the St. Demetrius Church. It’s an ideal family trail combining nature and Lemko history.
list.4: 4. Trail to Wierchomla Hut – views and pastoral charm Length: approx. 2.5 km (from Wierchomla Mała, one way) Time: approx. 1 h one way Difficulty: Easy Description: The black trail from Wierchomla Mała (approx. 10 km from Muszyna) to the Wierchomla Hut is a short but highly scenic route, especially recommended for families with children. The meadow by the hut offers views of the Tatras, Pieniny, and Radziejowa Range. The shelter is known for its cozy atmosphere and delicious regional dishes. You can drive to the ski lift to shorten the route.
list.5: 5. Czarna Młaka Nature Trail – a hidden gem Length: approx. 4 km (loop from Powroźnik) Time: approx. 1.5-2 h Difficulty: Easy Description: Czarna Młaka, located on the slopes of Czarna Garby, is a unique landslide lake protected as a natural monument. The yellow trail from Powroźnik (approx. 5 km from Muszyna) leads through a forest, making it ideal for hot days. At the site, you’ll find viewing platforms and a gazebo for rest. It’s a quiet, rarely visited trail, perfect for those seeking peace and nature.

alt.1: Muszyna Castle with a tower and viewpoint

cta.text: Planning a mountain adventure? Start at Muszynova – rent a bike, use the maps, plan your route, and relax in our park after your ride. With us, active rest begins comfortably and stress-free.

3.header: How to spend a weekend in Muszyna? Plan for a perfect getaway
3.text: Muszyna, a charming spa town in the Beskid Sądecki, is a perfect destination for a weekend getaway. Located in the Poprad Valley, it offers a blend of relaxation, outdoor activities, rich history, and regional flavors. We’ve prepared a plan for an ideal weekend in Muszyna to help you discover the city’s and surrounding area’s top attractions. As a bonus, we invite you to our Muszynova Recreational-Sports Park, where plenty of entertainment awaits! Here’s a suggestion for two days full of experiences.
3.header3: The best hiking trails in Muszyna

list.1: Day 1: Relaxation and history - Start your weekend with a walk through the Sensory Gardens on the slopes of Sucha Góra, where you can relax among fragrant herbs and murmuring streams while admiring the Beskid Sądecki from the viewing tower. Next, visit the medieval castle ruins on Baszta Hill, offering views of the Poprad Valley. Have lunch at Karczma nad Popradem, trying pierogi with bryndza or trout. After lunch, head to the Biblical Gardens by St. Joseph’s Church to quietly admire arrangements inspired by the Bible and try water from the ‘Maryja’ spring. Visit the ‘Milusia’ tasting room to sample healing ‘Muszynianka.’ End the day with a stroll through the Zapopradzie Spa Park, full of paths and ponds, and dine at Muszynova Restaurant, where regional flavors await.
list.2: Day 2: Nature and activity - Start the second day with a hike to Malnik Hill, where an easy trail leads to the 2023 viewing tower with a panorama of the Beskid Sądecki. Then, experience an adventure on a family-friendly Poprad River pontoon rafting trip organized by Poprad Rafting. After rafting, have lunch at Gospoda u Krakowiaka in Złockie, tasting Lemko żurek or homemade dishes. Next, visit the Regional Museum in a 17th-century inn to learn about Muszyna’s history and Lemko culture. Spend some time in the town center shopping for souvenirs or enjoying coffee at Cafe Muszyna. End your weekend at the Muszynova Recreational-Sports Park, where you can play volleyball, try climbing, rent a bike, or work out at the gym. Kids will love the playroom with mazes and slides. For dinner, choose the park’s restaurant with regional dishes.

alt.1: I Love Muszyna sign

cta.header: A weekend full of attractions? Only with Muszynova
cta.text: Plan an unforgettable weekend with Muszynova! We offer bikes, squash, family-friendly attractions, and delicious food – all in one place. We make active relaxation easy – right in the heart of Muszyna.

4.header: Active Holiday in the Beskid Sądecki
4.text: The areas around Muszyna and Krynica-Zdrój are places where nature meets culture, and active leisure blends with relaxation. Rafting on the Poprad River, cycling along the Velo Krynica route, or strolling along Krynica's promenade are just a few of the opportunities this region offers. Visit Muszyna, take advantage of Muszynova bike rentals, and discover Beskid Sądecki on your own!
4.header3: The surroundings of Muszyna and Krynica are a paradise for activity lovers

list.1: Hiking and cycling trails – Relaxation and history – Beskid Sądecki offers many tourist trails of varying difficulty. From Muszyna, it's worth taking the green trail to Jaworzyna Krynicka (1114 m a.s.l.), offering a breathtaking panorama of the Beskids and even the Tatras on clear days. The route goes through the 'Obrożyska Lime Forest' reserve and the ruins of the Muszyna castle, making it a natural and historical adventure. For cyclists, the Velo Krynica trail, about 12 km long, is an ideal choice. It leads from Krynica through Powroźnik to Muszyna. The route is comfortable and separated from car traffic, making it safe even for families with children. In Krynica, you’ll find bike rentals, including electric ones that make it easier to tackle hills.
list.2: Rafting on the Poprad – Nature and activity – The Poprad River flowing through Muszyna is a perfect spot for kayaking or pontoon rafting. The trip from Muszyna to Żegiestów (about 10 km) takes around 2 hours and is gentle, ideal for beginners and families. Picturesque landscapes of the Poprad Valley, forested hills, and the calm river current make it an unforgettable adventure. Local companies in Muszyna organize the rafting, providing equipment and return transport for comfort and safety. After the rafting trip, continue your active day in Muszyna! Rent a bike from local rentals like Muszynova and explore scenic cycling routes. The popular route from Muszyna to Krynica runs along the Poprad River and showcases the beauty of the Beskid landscape. Muszynova offers both traditional and electric bikes, perfect for those seeking comfort on gently hilly terrain. Along the way, stop in Muszyna to relax in the Sensory Gardens or enjoy local specialties at one of the regional inns.

alt.1: Konieczna Pasture

cta.header: Plan an active weekend in the Beskid Sądecki
cta.text: Looking to combine relaxation with outdoor adventure? The Beskid Sądecki is the perfect destination for a weekend getaway. Use the Muszynova rental service, explore scenic hiking and cycling trails, and enjoy an unforgettable rafting trip on the Poprad River. Don’t wait — book your active escape today!

5.header: Squash – A Sport with Class. Discover Its History and Why You Should Try It
5.text: Did you know that squash is one of the fastest and most intense racket sports in the world? A game now associated with a modern lifestyle actually dates back to the 19th century!
5.header2: Why Has Squash Conquered the World?

list.1: Origins in England – squash was born in elite British schools (e.g. Harrow School) around 1830, when students noticed the ball 'squashed' against the wall – hence the name.
list.2: Sport development – over time, squash gained popularity in sports clubs worldwide, especially in English-speaking countries.
list.3: International recognition – in the 20th century, the first federations emerged (e.g. World Squash Federation), and squash became a professional sport.
list.4: Small space, big action – squash courts are compact, but the pace and intensity are extremely high.
list.5: Perfect for busy people – an efficient workout after work, 30 minutes is enough to really sweat!
list.6: Accessibility – easy to learn at an amateur level, but also rich in tactical depth.
list.7: Squash in numbers (for fun fact lovers): Over 20 million players worldwide. In a professional match, players may run up to 5 km in 45 minutes. The squash ball can reach speeds up to 270 km/h!
list.8: Why play squash at Muszynova? Modern courts with excellent lighting and ventilation. Recreational play or sessions with an instructor. Equipment rental available – just come, play, and fall in love!

cta.text: Modern courts, great conditions, and on-site equipment rental – whether you're playing for fun or trying something new, Muszynova is the perfect place for a sporty reset!

6.text: Is there anything better than combining active relaxation with mountain landscapes, a health resort climate, and a touch of adventure? If you're dreaming of a day full of activity, fresh air, and beautiful views, a cycling trip around Muszyna is a perfect choice. And the best part? It all starts here – at the Muszynova bike rental, where you can begin your ride stress-free with perfectly fitted equipment.

list.1: 1. Muszyna Tourist Loop Length: approx. 30 km Level: intermediate Time: approx. 4 hours The route runs through the valleys of Muszynka and Szczawny Potok, passing scenic viewpoints and charming villages. Ideal for a half-day trip with moderate fitness.
list.2: 2. Carpathian Cycling Trail (Leluchów–Wierchomla segment) Length: approx. 25 km Level: easy Time: 2–3 hours A scenic route along the Poprad valley – perfect for families and beginners. Rest stops and several mineral springs await along the way.
list.3: 3. Velo Krynica – from Krynica-Zdrój to Muszyna Length: approx. 11 km Level: very easy This comfortable asphalt path is ideal for beginner cyclists. You can start in Krynica and finish in Muszyna, returning by train or making a loop through Powroźnik.
list.4: Muszynova Bike Rental – hit the trail without extra gear! Don’t have your own bike? Don’t want to bring it on holiday? Muszynova offers a fully equipped rental spot right by the Sports and Recreation Park. Perfect for tourists, spa visitors, families with kids, or MTB enthusiasts. Available: trekking and mountain bikes, child seats, helmets, accessories route maps and planning help affordable prices: rent by the hour or full day bikes regularly serviced and adjusted to your height
list.5: Cycling discoveries – what will you see along the way? Gardens of Senses and Biblical Gardens St. James Church in Powroźnik (UNESCO) ruins of the Muszyna castle and scenic platforms picturesque mineral springs footbridges over the Poprad River, meadows, forests, and streams It’s a perfect way to explore the region – slowly and close to nature.

alt.1: Multiple bicycles in front of the Muszynova Recreation and Sports Park in Muszyna

cta.header: Your cycling adventure begins at Muszynova
cta.text: No bike? No problem! Muszynova Rental offers modern bikes and everything you need to ride – comfortably, safely, and with joy. Discover Beskid Sądecki from the saddle!

park.text: For us, activity means variety. So that everyone can enjoy it, spend their time well, however they like, regardless of skill level or sports discipline. We’re ready for both fun and intense workouts – for the young and old, amateurs and professionals. Professional equipment, modern facilities in a beautiful interior – all of this awaits you at Muszynova. Come and discover!

alt.1: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park from the outside against a beautiful natural backdrop

cards.text: Muszyna is a well-known and beloved spa town that has been developing dynamically in recent years, attracting tourists from all over the world. This charming resort, nestled in the Beskid Sądecki region, captivates with its nature and numerous attractions, including sensory gardens, historic landmarks, mountain and cycling trails, as well as mineral water springs.

card1.text: With a certified, multi-layered Gerflor Teraflex sports surface. We invite you to play team sports: indoor football, volleyball, basketball, handball, badminton, as well as gymnastics.

card2.text: Equipped with two bowling lanes. We’ve also included a relaxation area in the bowling room for users waiting to start their game.

card3.text: Designed for both amateurs and professionals. Our structure is a modern space with geometric shapes and protrusions, covering 90 m². The wall’s size allows three people to use it simultaneously, featuring 6 top-rope belay points and 18 individual belay points.

card4.text: Equipped with a play structure where children can enjoy numerous attractions: mazes, tunnels, ladders, a slide, and ball pits. Additionally, the playroom has a dedicated toddler area with soft poufs, a ball pit, and manipulative-sensory boards, allowing the youngest to both play and learn.

card5.text: Built in accordance with WSF (World Squash Federation) guidelines. The courts are designed for both team competitions and relaxation through individual training.

card6.text: With a diverse range of bikes and accessories for children and adults who prefer spending time outdoors. You’ll find men’s, women’s, and children’s bikes, as well as essential gear for safe riding.

card7.text: Equipped with two tables for a favorite activity of both young and old – the popular game of ping pong. This attraction is suitable for people of all ages.

card8.text: Allows for a comprehensive circuit training session. You’ll find high-quality, certified, and safe equipment. The cardio zone includes treadmills, electromagnetic training bikes, rowing machines, elliptical trainers, and steppers.

card9.text: The fitness room enables comprehensive circuit and cardio training. Equipped with treadmills, electromagnetic training bikes, rowing machines, elliptical trainers, and steppers – all for your fitness and health.

card10.text: Equipped with a PlayStation console and a virtual reality (VR) system, the multimedia room is a place where gamers can immerse themselves in fascinating virtual worlds. Whether someone prefers fast-paced action games or exploratory VR adventures, our room offers complete freedom of entertainment choice.

gym.text1: If you want to effectively improve your fitness and achieve your goals with the support of qualified staff, our gym in Muszyna is the perfect place for you.
gym.text2: You’ll find high-quality equipment – certified and safe for users. Depending on your training plan and preferences, we offer a free weights zone, a machines zone, and a cardio zone.

alt.1: Sports equipment at Muszynova gym

cards.text: We provide access to modern equipment and employ experienced trainers who are ready to tailor a training plan specifically to your needs. Thanks to this personalized approach and our staff’s expertise, you’ll easily achieve your desired results. We believe that together we can create a plan that meets your expectations and motivates you to train regularly while maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

card1.text: If you’re unsure how to start, our experienced trainers will conduct a consultation with you, thoroughly analyzing your goals, training history, and any physical limitations. They’ll show you how to properly use all the available equipment.

card2.text: Our trainers can create a personalized training plan tailored to your individual needs and goals. They’ll take a comprehensive approach, considering both your current abilities and fitness aspirations, so you can achieve optimal results.

card3.text: We also offer personal training sessions, during which a trainer will personally explain how to perform each exercise correctly. With this personalized approach, your training will become even more effective, and you’ll receive detailed guidance on technique, intensity, and progression.

fitness.text1: Fitness classes at Muszynova Park were created with health, good condition, and the joy of physical activity in mind. Regardless of your skill level, age, or training goals, we have something for everyone.
fitness.text2: Our instructors are ready to guide you through various forms of activity, from high-intensity, energetic sessions to static, relaxing Pilates classes.

alt.1: Green exercise balls and mats in a mirrored fitness room in Muszyna
alt.2: Fitness class with an instructor on mats
alt.4: Fitness class with participants of all ages

cards.text: Our fitness instructors offer workouts that vary in intensity, use of additional weights, or other equipment. Depending on whether you want to improve your endurance or focus on building and strengthening muscles, you can choose the type of training yourself. Beyond burning calories and overall body strengthening, fitness is above all about having fun!

card1.text: We invite the youngest to discover the joy of movement and a healthy lifestyle together at Muszynova. Our classes for children develop physical fitness and foster positive habits that will benefit their health and condition in the future.

card2.text: For our adult participants, Muszynova offers a variety of fitness classes tailored to different skill levels, helping you maintain good physical shape while also providing a moment of relaxation and escape from daily stress.

card3.text: Our experienced personal trainers work with each client, tailoring a training plan to their individual needs, skills, and ambitions. Individual training allows you to focus on specific areas such as improving strength, weight loss, increasing flexibility, or overall fitness enhancement.

sportshall.text1: Our sports hall is a place where sport becomes a passion, and movement is a way to promote health and develop skills. It’s a space that offers excellent conditions for practicing various sports disciplines while inspiring an active lifestyle and friendly competition.
sportshall.text2: The sports hall is a facility with a court that can serve as a basketball, volleyball, badminton, or handball court. It’s a vibrant place that creates ideal conditions for both professional athletes and sports enthusiasts.

alt.1: Sports hall with volleyball net, scoreboards and climbing wall in Muszyna
alt.2: Volleyball net with climbing wall in the background

cards.text: At Muszynova, we warmly invite you to use our sports hall, where movement becomes a pleasure, and sport is not just physical activity but also a shared passion. Join us and discover the joy of staying active!

card1.text: Renting our sports hall guarantees professional infrastructure, flexible scheduling, and the support of experienced staff. We ensure that every event takes place in a friendly atmosphere, maintaining high standards of safety and comfort.

card2.text: Our hall is adapted for various sports disciplines such as basketball, volleyball, handball, and badminton. The flexibility of the space allows us to adjust the hall’s setup to specific needs, ensuring we can meet diverse expectations.

card3.text: Our sports hall was created to support physical activity and a healthy lifestyle among students. It’s possible to rent the hall for school classes or extracurricular activities.

minibowling.text1: Mini bowling is a fantastic form of entertainment that brings joy to both children and adults. Smaller pins, a shorter distance, but the same dose of fun – all of this awaits mini bowling enthusiasts at our recreational center.
minibowling.text2: Mini bowling doesn’t require special skills, making it accessible to everyone. It’s also a great option for spending time with friends or family, encouraging healthy competition and shared fun.

alt.1: Girls playing on a mini bowling alley in Muszynova

cards.text: At Muszynova, we warmly invite you to our modern bowling alley, where a great atmosphere, modern facilities, and enthusiastic staff create the perfect conditions to enjoy this classic yet thrilling game. Let every throw be a reason for smiles and good fun!

card1.text: Bowling isn’t just a game for adults – it’s also a fantastic form of entertainment for the little ones. Colorful pins catch children’s attention, creating a dynamic and joyful atmosphere. It’s great fun and a way to develop motor skills, precision, and teamwork with peers.

card2.text: Bowling is a perfect way to organize an active party that will delight both young children and older guests.

card3.text: We offer the opportunity to organize dynamic group activities. It’s a great option for companies, schools, or groups of friends looking for an engaging and team-building way to spend time together.

climbingwall.text1: The climbing wall is a perfect year-round activity. It inspires you to reach new heights and overcome your own limitations.
climbingwall.text2: Our climbing wall offers unforgettable experiences for climbers of all skill levels, from those just starting their climbing journey to seasoned enthusiasts.

alt.1: Climbing wall with colorful elements in Muszyna
alt.2: Girl climbing on the climbing wall in Muszynova

cards.text: Safety is our priority. The solid construction of the wall and professional safety measures ensure that every climber can focus on reaching new heights without worrying about their safety. Our climbing wall offers a variety of routes tailored to the skills and experience of each climber.

card1.text: We invite you to join our group climbing wall classes. Our sessions are designed for various skill levels, adapting to the abilities and experience of each participant.

card2.text: Our experienced instructors will tailor the program to your skill level, personal goals, and learning pace. This allows you to focus on the specific aspects of climbing that matter most to you. It’s also an ideal option for those who value privacy and want to concentrate on their own progress.

card3.text: For schools, we offer educational classes where students can develop climbing skills under the watchful eye of experienced instructors. It’s a great opportunity to improve physical fitness, foster teamwork skills, and build confidence.

playground.text1: The children’s playroom is a space designed especially for the little ones, allowing them to play and spend active time in a safe environment. In this room, children have access to a variety of attractions that bring them joy and fun.
playground.text2: They can enjoy creative activities and other forms of entertainment. The playroom ensures that every child feels comfortable and has the opportunity to interact with their peers. It’s a perfect place where kids can develop their social skills, share with others, and collaborate in a group.

alt.1: Toys, table, and chairs in the playroom in Muszyna
alt.3: Play mat with children's toys on it

cards.header: You Train While Your Child Plays Under Our Caregivers’ Supervision.
cards.text: Organize a birthday party at Muszynova. We provide excellent conditions and a range of attractions to make this day even more special. We offer spacious rooms perfect for hosting a birthday party, themed decorations, and entertainers. For the youngest, we provide animations, games, and contests. For older children, we have a wide range of attractions, such as mini bowling, a multimedia room, or a gaming zone.

card1.text: While you focus on an intense workout, we ensure safe and joyful playtime for your child. In a specially designed play area, under the supervision of a caregiver, your child can enjoy all the attractions and have a great time. We make sure every child feels comfortable and can actively spend time in a safe environment.

card2.text: Our entertainers will ensure the kids’ time is filled with smiles. We organize creative games, contests, and arts and crafts activities tailored to the children’s age and interests. Safety and the well-being of the children are our priority, so you can rest assured that your child is under the constant care of qualified professionals who will take care of every detail to create a day full of positive experiences and joy.

card3.text: We are a new venue in our area offering a modern jungle gym for children. It’s a specially designed space where your little ones can explore, play, and develop their skills through interaction with elements tailored to their age. Our innovative jungle gym concept guarantees that children will have a unique opportunity to gain new skills through play in a safe and friendly environment.

squash.text1: Our squash court is a place where enthusiasts of this dynamic sport will find everything they need for an exciting game.
squash.text2: Equipped with a professional court, our space is designed for both experienced players and those just starting their squash journey. Come, dive into the fast-paced game of squash, and experience unforgettable emotions!

alt.1: Professional squash court with certified dimensions
alt.2: Squash court with a racket and ball in the foreground
alt.3: Racket and ball on a squash court
alt.4: Squash court with racket and ball

cards.text: Take on the challenge and try your hand at squash – a dynamic and increasingly popular sport that originated from tennis. It’s an intense game that delivers an adrenaline rush while also improving mobility and fitness. It’s not only an effective conditioning workout but also a great opportunity to burn a lot of calories. By playing squash, you’re not just having fun – you’re actively taking care of your health and physical condition.

card1.header: The Only One in the Area
card1.text: A unique squash court offering unforgettable experiences. The only space of its kind in Muszyna and the surrounding area!

card2.text: Book your squash court with just a few clicks through our online reservation system, saving you time.

card3.text: We invite you to use our squash court 7 days a week. Call us at 509 445 000 or book online.

bikerental.text1: Our bike rental is the perfect spot for outdoor activity enthusiasts. We offer a wide selection of bikes – from city to mountain models – for both children and adults.
bikerental.text2: Rent a bike and explore the picturesque trails of Muszyna and its surroundings, enjoying the beauty of nature. It’s a great way to stay active and enjoy leisure time, regardless of your experience!

alt.1: Numerous bicycles with Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in the background in Muszyna
alt.2: Reception area with a comfortable couch against the staircase backdrop in Muszynova

cards.text: At Muszynova, we offer modern bikes in excellent condition, tailored to various trails and needs. Rent a bike and set off on an adventure – from leisurely rides to challenging mountain trails. It’s not just a way to stay active, but also an opportunity to explore the region in an eco-friendly way!

card1.text: Discover Muszyna and its surroundings by bike – we recommend the best trails for both beginner and advanced cyclists!

card2.text: Rent the perfect bike for you – we have city bikes, mountain bikes, children’s bikes, and accessories like helmets and child seats.

card3.text: Our bike rental is open 7 days a week. Call us at 509 445 000 and start your cycling adventure!

gameroom.text1: At Muszynova Park, we wanted to create a place where you can compete and have fun with your friends. For fans of strategy and precision, we offer a professional billiards table and table tennis tables where you can improve your concentration and hand-eye coordination skills. Additionally, for those who enjoy fast-paced and thrilling games, we’ve prepared a foosball table and an air hockey table.
gameroom.text2: A friendly atmosphere, modern equipment, and excellent entertainment ensure that the time spent at Muszynova is not only active but also incredibly enjoyable. We invite you to discover the fascinating world in a new way.

alt.1: Flick football table with table football and ping pong table in the background
alt.2: Bright room with table football and flick football game
alt.4: Pool table in the game room at Muszynova

cards.text: In our game room, you’ll find attractions that provide unforgettable moments, whether you’re playing solo or with friends and family. The professional billiards table offers the chance to compete and hone your skills, creating an atmosphere of sporting passion. Meanwhile, the foosball and air hockey tables immerse players in a world of excitement and fast-paced action. At Muszynova, we focus not only on physical activity but also on the overall enjoyment of your time at our recreational center. We invite you to explore the fascinating world of games and fun at Muszynova!

card1.text: Billiards is not only great fun but also an excellent way to develop concentration, precision, and strategic planning skills. Playing billiards allows you to build strategies and tactics. Regardless of your skill level, billiards is accessible to everyone while offering excitement for both amateurs and professionals.

card2.text: Foosball perfectly combines competition and fun, making every game an unforgettable experience for all participants.

card3.text: Air hockey, also known as table hockey, is an electrifying game that brings competition to a flat table surface. Played with special pucks and paddles, it offers fast-paced, reflex-driven gameplay and thrilling matches full of excitement.

multimediaroom.text1: The heart of our multimedia room is the latest PlayStation, where we provide access to the best games and entertainment for console gaming fans.
multimediaroom.text2: From thrilling adventures to exciting sports matches, there’s something for everyone. All of this can be enjoyed on comfortable bean bags, creating the perfect setting to immerse yourself in the world of virtual entertainment.

alt.1: Boy holding a PlayStation 5 controller in his hand
alt.2: Boy sitting in front of a TV playing a sports game on a gaming console

cards.text: Equipped with a PlayStation console and a virtual reality (VR) system, the multimedia room is a place where gamers can dive into fascinating virtual worlds. Whether someone prefers fast-paced action games or exploratory VR adventures, our room offers complete freedom of entertainment choice.

card1.text: We invite you to our modern multimedia room, where the world of PlayStation becomes a true adventure! The latest games, unforgettable emotions, and unparalleled experiences in virtual entertainment await you.

card2.text: We invite you to discover a new dimension of entertainment in our unique multimedia room with virtual reality (VR). It’s a place where the boundaries of reality blend with fantasy, creating unforgettable experiences.

card3.text: Plan a special birthday in our fantastic multimedia room, where every moment becomes an unforgettable adventure! You don’t have to worry about the organization – our team will take care of every detail, so you can focus solely on enjoying the moment.

restaurantpage.header3: Organize with Us in a New Way
restaurantpage.text1: At Muszynova Restaurant, we bring Beskid flavors to life in a modern style. Our menu features carefully selected, healthy and light dishes made from local ingredients. A short yet refined selection with regional accents helps you discover the richness of Beskid cuisine.
restaurantpage.text2: We focus on simplicity, flavor, and quality – with no compromises. Looking for a light lunch, a family meal, or something delicious for the evening? Everyone will find something at our place – kids, teens, and adults. From traditional tastes to modern twists – including healthier versions of pizza. It's more than just food – it's a space for meetings, relaxation, and fun. Maybe a drink or a homemade dessert to end the day? At Muszynova, we take care of your taste and your time.

alt.1: Muszynova restaurant hall with atmospheric lighting
alt.2: Signature dish of Muszynova's head chef

card1.text: Muszynova Restaurant – discover flavors and have great fun. We ensure the perfect combination: good times, good company, in a great place. We provide a comfortable venue for organizing parties and events – family and social gatherings, anniversaries, corporate banquets, team-building events, communions, or weddings. Organize with us and discover a new quality.

card2.text: We have two comfortable rooms with a combined area of over 250 square meters. Both rooms can host two independent events simultaneously. Additionally, we have a sports hall available, where we organize sports events as well as exhibitions, shows, fairs, or concerts. It’s a place for you to discover.

card3.text: We invite business clients to organize conferences. Next to the restaurant, we have the Nova Room – modern and air-conditioned. It features a projector displaying images up to 15 square meters. The equipment includes fully professional audio-video cabling, allowing for quick and efficient setup with external devices. Comfortable and modern.

card4.header: Healthy Beskid Cuisine – Near Nowy Sącz
card4.text: Muszynova is a restaurant focused on health and lightness. Our menu features fresh, local ingredients and regional inspirations that will satisfy guests from Muszyna, Nowy Sącz, and beyond. Come visit, try our healthy dishes, and enjoy the Beskid atmosphere in a cozy interior.

card5.text: At Muszynova, we care for the whole family. Our kids' menu combines healthy ingredients with delicious flavors that children love. A comfortable and friendly interior makes families from Nowy Sącz and nearby towns feel right at home during shared meals.

card6.text: Charming interiors, loft atmosphere, ambient lighting, and comfort make Muszynova the perfect place to stay longer. Ideal for coffee meetups, romantic evenings, or simply relaxing with delicious food.

pricing.alt: Price list of Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in Muszyna

alt.1: Muszynova facility - aerial view
alt.2: Menu card placed on a table at Muszynova restaurant

contact.alt: Business card of Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park with contact information

card6.hours2: For holders of active passes with club cards - through the back entrance from the parking side

form.message1: Thank You for Submitting the Form!
form.message2: We’ll Get Back to You as Soon as Possible.
form.error: Please fill in all required fields.
form.error2: Please confirm that you are not a robot before submitting.

muszyna.text: Muszyna, a recognized spa town, is renowned for its numerous mineral water springs and bottling plants. It features mineral water tasting rooms, sanatoriums, swimming pools, and picturesque parks.

academy.text: A fully professional football academy with a modern and extensive sports facility.

muks.text: Collaboration with sports, governmental, local, and union authorities to provide members with optimal conditions for practicing sports.

galicya.text: OSW 'GALICYA' is the perfect place for family vacations, short weekend stays, as well as business meetings and work trips. It is a recently modernized hotel and conference facility that meets standards and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.

alpina.text: The Alpina Sport & Spa Recreation Center is the perfect place to unwind and recharge for further study or work.

kolejarz.text: Located in one of Poland’s most beautiful regions, this center offers comfortable accommodations and a rich sports and recreational program.

hospital.text: Located in Krynica-Zdrój, the 20th Military Spa and Rehabilitation Hospital SPZOZ is 12 km from the Muszyna castle ruins and 33 km from Wierchomla Train Station.

artur.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day after day. Make today the first step toward achieving great goals.

activ.text: The Activ & Vital clinic was created for women at every stage of life, addressing issues from painful menstruation to perinatal therapy, and offering prevention and treatment for pelvic floor disorders.

relaks.text: Relax House 'On the Hill' in Muszyna is the perfect spot for a getaway in a spa-like setting, offering unique attractions for relaxation and rejuvenation.

revita.text: Nestled in the charming Muszyna valley, Revita Sanatorium blends the peace of nature with the healing power of local mineral waters.

aquapark.text: AquaPark Lipany, the newest thermal water park in Slovakia and the only one located in the mountains, lies in Lipany. Situated between Poprad and Prešov, it’s just 22 km from the Polish border and 40 km from Krynica-Zdrój.

krynica.text: Located in the Beskid Sądecki mountains in the Kryniczanka stream valley, Krynica is surrounded by Parkowa, Krzyżowa, and Jasiennik hills. Within the Poprad Landscape Park, it serves as a gateway to nearby mountains.

hotel.text: Opened in 2010 in the scenic Muszyna-Złockie valley in the heart of Beskid Sądecki, Hotel Muszyna*** is surrounded by the stunning landscapes of the Poprad Landscape Park.

reviews.text: Welcome to Muszynova – a place where elegance meets exquisite taste. Enjoy delicious dishes, from juicy burgers to exquisite tartares and sweet desserts, paired with refreshing drinks. Our polite service and calm atmosphere will make every visit a moment of relaxation and pleasure. Spend a lovely afternoon with your loved ones and discover why our guests keep coming back for more!

1.name: Mariolka Pyrz
1.text: A very elegant restaurant. Delicious tartar, very good pizzas, and excellent desserts. A very nice place to relax. Highly recommend 👍

2.name: Amelia
2.text: The service was polite and always smiling, creating a nice atmosphere. The place is calm, perfect for relaxation. The burger was delicious and juicy, and the Aperol refreshing and perfectly balanced.

3.name: Beata Sękowska
3.text: A great place to spend a lovely afternoon with friends. Very good drinks. Pleasant service.

4.name: AK K.
4.text: A beautiful and new playroom for small and medium-sized children, there’s even a nursing room and changing tables! Great value and a nice interior.

5.name: Bolek Lolek
5.text: Delicious schnitzel. Overall, a very well-maintained and clean place. Climbing wall, kids' room, game room, everything is new.

6.name: Monika Sam
6.text: A fantastic new place with friendly people, very nice service, and cleanliness throughout the building. The gym is well-equipped, and the trainers are helpful. Highly recommend. 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩

7.name: Magda Thomas
7.text: The latest local gem. Very nice, friendly atmosphere. Professional service, great instructors. Interesting offer and affordable prices. Definitely worth visiting regularly.

homepage.title: Muszynova - Recreational and Sports Park & Restaurant in Muszyna
homepage.description: Discover Muszynova – a recreational and sports park with a gym, climbing wall, squash, and more. Enjoy healthy dining at Muszynova Restaurant with Beskid flavors!

contact.title: Muszynova - Contact - Park and Restaurant in Muszyna
contact.description: Contact Muszynova! Recreational and Sports Park and Restaurant in Muszyna – Złockie 77c St., tel. +48 509 445 000, biuro@muszynova.pl.

aboutus.title: About Us - Muszynova in Muszyna
aboutus.description: Learn about Muszynova – a modern recreational and sports park and restaurant in Muszyna. We offer sports, entertainment, and Beskid flavors for everyone!

park.title: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park - Activities in Muszyna
park.description: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in Muszyna – gym, fitness, squash, bikes, sports hall, playroom. Entertainment and sports for everyone!

gym.title: Muszynova Gym - Training and Passes in Muszyna
gym.description: Muszynova Gym in Muszyna – modern equipment, personal trainers, training plans, and passes. Improve your fitness and achieve your goals!

fitness.title: Muszynova Fitness - Classes in Muszyna
fitness.description: Fitness at Muszynova – classes for kids and adults in Muszyna. Personal and group training, pilates – improve your fitness and enjoy movement!

squash.title: Muszynova Squash - Court in Muszyna
squash.description: Squash at Muszynova – the only professional court in Muszyna. Play 7 days a week, book online, improve your fitness, and enjoy a dynamic game!

multimediaroom.title: Muszynova Multimedia Room – Modern Entertainment in Muszyna
multimediaroom.description: Discover the modern Multimedia Room at Muszynova! Interactive games, virtual reality, and unforgettable entertainment for the whole family. See what awaits you!

gameroom.title: Muszynova Game Room - Entertainment in Muszyna
gameroom.description: Muszynova Game Room in Muszyna – billiards, foosball, air hockey, table tennis for everyone. Active entertainment, competition, and fun – visit us!

climbingwall.title: Muszynova Climbing Wall
climbingwall.description: Muszynova Climbing Wall in Muszyna – safe group and individual classes, for schools. Climbing for kids and adults at all levels!

minibowling.title: Muszynova Mini Bowling - Muszyna
minibowling.description: Muszynova Mini Bowling in Muszyna – fun for kids, adults, and groups. Birthdays, team-building, bowling in a friendly atmosphere – check us out!

playroom.title: Muszynova Playroom - Muszyna
playroom.description: Muszynova Playroom in Muszyna – for kids: jungle gym, animations, birthdays, games. Safe childcare during parents’ training – joy and development!

bikerental.title: Muszynova Bike Rental
bikerental.description: Muszynova Bike Rental in Muszyna – bikes for everyone, local trails, 7 days a week. Explore the region actively – check our pricing!

sportshall.title: Muszynova Sports Hall - Muszyna
sportshall.description: Muszynova Sports Hall in Muszyna – rentals, team games: basketball, volleyball, badminton. Offer for schools and sports enthusiasts!

restaurant.title: Muszynova Restaurant - Beskid Flavors in Muszyna
restaurant.description: Muszynova Restaurant in Muszyna – regional Beskid cuisine, pizza, drinks, events, conferences. Delicious and modern – visit us!

pricing.title: Pricing for Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park
pricing.description: Discover the current pricing for services and products at Muszynova. Check the details and choose the best offer for you!

groupclasses.title: Muszynova Group Classes - Muszyna
groupclasses.description: Group classes at Muszynova – fitness, climbing, squash, and more in Muszyna. Join group training and enjoy team activities!

gallery.title: Gallery - Muszynova
gallery.description: Welcome to the Muszynova gallery! See photos of the park and restaurant, showcasing the beauty and unique atmosphere of our place.

parkgallery.title: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park Gallery
parkgallery.description: Welcome to the Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park gallery. See areas for active leisure, sports attractions, and the beauty of nature!

restaurantgallery.title: Muszynova Restaurant Gallery
restaurantgallery.description: Discover the Muszynova Restaurant photo gallery. See elegant interiors, appetizing dishes prepared with passion, and a unique atmosphere that delights guests and makes every visit unforgettable!

partners.title: Our Partners | Muszyna, Krynica-Zdrój & More
partners.description: Discover our partners: spas, hotels, sports academies, and attractions in Muszyna, Krynica-Zdrój, and the Beskid Sądecki region.

blog.title: Blog - Muszynova
blog.description: Discover the latest articles on the Muszynova blog – inspiration, travel tips, and guides for those planning a getaway to Muszyna and its surroundings.

muszyna-10-najlepszych-atrakcji.title: Top 10 Attractions in Muszyna
muszyna-10-najlepszych-atrakcji.description: Discover the top 10 attractions in Muszyna – from themed gardens to historic castles. A perfect list for every season.

muszyna-najlepsze-szlaki-turystyczne.title: Best Hiking Trails in Muszyna
muszyna-najlepsze-szlaki-turystyczne.description: Explore the best hiking trails in Muszyna – scenic routes for families, beginners, and experienced hikers.

jak-spedzic-weekend-w-muszynie.title: How to Spend a Weekend in Muszyna
jak-spedzic-weekend-w-muszynie.description: Plan the perfect weekend in Muszyna – attractions, activities, and local flavours that will make you fall in love with the region.

aktywny-wypoczynek-w-beskidzie-sadeckim.title: Active Holiday in Muszyna and Krynica-Zdrój – Beskid Sądecki
aktywny-wypoczynek-w-beskidzie-sadeckim.description: Discover the beauty of Beskid Sądecki! Rafting on the Poprad River, Velo Krynica bike trails, mountain hikes, and relaxation in Muszyna. The perfect place for an active and nature-filled weekend.

historia-squasha.title: The History of Squash – How This Dynamic Sport Began
historia-squasha.description: Discover the fascinating history of squash – from British schools to global courts. Learn how this elite sport gained worldwide popularity and why you should give it a try!

rowerem-przez-muszyne.title: Cycling through Muszyna – routes, views & Muszynova bike rental
rowerem-przez-muszyne.description: Discover the best cycling routes around Muszyna and rent your perfect bike at Muszynova - quality gear, route planning support, and stress-free outdoor fun.
